alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 5:48PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Juab and south central Tooele Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 548 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Utah Test and Training Range South to 7 miles southwest of Dugway Proving Ground Test Range to 14 miles south of Fish Springs Wildlife Refuge. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dugway English Village, Utah Test and Training Range South, Dugway Proving Ground Test Range, Clive and Fish Springs Wildlife Refuge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Western Millard and Juab Counties
